page.syntax: Code_Text as C = copy.run(C layoutname [,C filter [,C order [,L silent [,L show_xbasic [,* arguments ]]]]])

argument.name: Code_Text
argument.description: The Xbasic code that was run performing the operation.

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of a previously created copy operation.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records to copy.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: silent
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = No user interaction.
.F. = User interaction.

page.discussion: The COPY.RUN() method exports data using a previously defined copy operation. The method is not thread safe, which means that it cannot be run on an A5W page. If the Silent flag is set to .T., then Alpha Five does not display any confirmation dialog boxes before running the operation. Note : If you specify an optional filter argument, the filter is applied in addition to any filter that may have been defined as Part of the Operation. (You can check to see if a filter is defined as Part of an Operation by editing the saved operation, and selecting the "Select records" menu item.)
